entry.title: 用matlab画Sphere Coordinate System
entry.content: matlab Figure %create a figure [x,y,z]=sphere(10) %get the mesh of x,y,z for 10x10 surface sphere h=surf(x,y,z) %create the object of surface axis equal set(h,'FaceColor',[0 0 0],'FaceAlpha',0.5) %change the surface color, and alpha 寫thesis需要各種圖，那些圖用photoshop畫會瘋掉。Matlab可以畫出科學上需要的圖。
